resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Basic Todo List API
  description: |-
    This is a basic TodoList API created in Elixir.
    
    Find more in [https://github.com/dwyl/learn-insomnia](https://github.com/dwyl/learn-insomnia).
  license:
    name: MIT
    url: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
  contact:
    name: Dwyl
  version: 1.0.11
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:4000
tags:
  - name: todo
    description: Operations about Todo Items
paths:
  /:
    post:
      tags:
        - todo
      summary: Add a new todo item
      description: Creates a new todo item
      operationId: addTodo
      requestBody:
        description: Add a new todo item
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
        '400':
          description: Invalid input
    get:
      tags:
        - todo
      summary: Lists todo items
      description: Lists todo items
      operationId: listTodos
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'          
  /todos/{todoId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - todo
      summary: Find pet by ID
      description: Returns a single pet
      operationId: getTodoById
      parameters:
        - name: todoId
          in: path
          description: ID of todo to return
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'          
components:
  schemas:
    Todo:
      required:
        - item
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          example: 10
        item:
          type: string
          example: Something to do today
